title: The Unlucky Living
description:
Luck is having great success (or failure) that happens by chance rather than through one's own actions. Finding a hundred dollar bill could be your lucky day, (but probably the worst day for whomever lost it). And that's the thing about luck, if you get caught on the wrong side of it, it might be the death of you.

First, “finders keepers” may not be lucky after all
Followed by nefarious deeds with killer consequences
Then, be careful what you wish for
Finally in our featured story, destruction lurks right under your nose

To start your free two-week trial, go to https://www.monday.com/podcast
